preconditions: Admin has access to the Template Configuration screen
testSteps: Click Create Template. Enter template name and message content. Select tier as Active. Click Create.
expectedResult: Template is created and listed in the Template Configuration table with correct details.

testSteps: Select each tier option: Active, At Risk, Dormant. Save template. Reopen it for preview.
expectedResult: Tier value persists accurately after save and reload.

preconditions: At least one predefined template suggestion exists
testSteps: Open Create Template modal. Click Predefined Template Suggestions dropdown. Select Follow-up 2. Click Create.
expectedResult: Message content field is auto-filled with the predefined template text. Template saves successfully.

preconditions: Template message includes variable placeholders such as {{student_name}}
testSteps: Preview the template content after saving.
expectedResult: Variables remain properly formatted in the editor and render correctly when used in notifications.

testSteps: Click Preview on any listed template.
expectedResult: Template preview modal opens showing tier, message body, and creation details accurately.

testSteps: Click the Delete button for a template. Confirm deletion when prompted.
expectedResult: Template is removed from the list. It no longer appears in search results or dropdowns.

testSteps: Attempt to click Create without entering template name or message content.
expectedResult: Validation message appears for required fields. Create button remains disabled until all fields are completed.

preconditions: More than one page of templates exists
testSteps: Use pagination controls to move between pages. Sort by Updated At.
expectedResult: Templates display correctly on each page. Sorting updates the order of results as expected.

preconditions: A template exists and is editable
testSteps: Edit message content. Click Save. Return to the Template Configuration table.
expectedResult: Updated At timestamp reflects the edit time accurately.

testSteps: Navigate to Notifications → Add Reminder → Template dropdown. Search for the new template.
expectedResult: Newly created template appears in the dropdown and can be selected for reminders.
